title: VA - Classical Favourites vol. 2 (3 CD) [1995]  FLAC
description:
Please seed!

VA - Classical Favourites vol. 2 (3 CD)
This release Sweden 1995

With art work (Swedish)

Composers:Bach, Barber, Bizet, Boccherini, Borodin, Brahms, Bruch, Dvorak, Grieg, Handel,
Khachaturian, Lumbye, Massenet, Monti, Mozart, Myers, Nielsen, Offenbach, Ponchielli,
Ravel, Rimsky-Korsakov, Sarasate, Satie, Schostakovich, Schubert, Sibelius, Smetana,
Richard Strauss, Strauss Sr, Strauss Jr, Stravinsky, Tchaikovsky, Waldteufel 

CD 1 Notturno
01  Grieg: Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, Op. 46, I. Morning Mood
02  Handel: Rinaldo, HWV 7, Act II. Lascia ch'io pianga (arr. for violin and orchestra)
03  Nielsen: Moderen (The Mother), Op. 41, FS 94. Taagen letter
04  Bach: Herz und Mund und Tat und Leben, BWV 147. Jesus bleibet meine Freude
          (Jesu, Joy of Man's Desiring)
05  Handel: Oboe Concerto No. 3 in G Minor, HWV 287, III. Sarabande: Largo
06  Schubert: Ellens Gesang III (Ave Maria!), Op. 52, No. 6, D. 839,
              "Hymne an die Jungfrau"
07  Massenet: Thais, Act II. Meditation (arr. for flute and harp)
08  Barber: Adagio for Strings, Op. 11
09  Myers: Cavatina (Theme from 'The Deer Hunter')
10  Boccherini: String Quintet in E Major, Op. 11, No. 5, G. 275. III. Minuetto
11  Bruch: Violin Concerto No. 1 in G Minor, Op. 26, II. Adagio
12  Satie: 3 Gymnopedies (arr. for guitar and orchestra)
13  Ravel: Pavane pour une infante defunte (version for orchestra)
14  Mozart: Serenade No. 13 in G Major, K. 525, 'Eine kleine Nachtmusik'. II. Romanze
15  Anonymous: Romance d`amour
16  Borodin: String Quartet No. 2 in D Major. III. Notturno

CD 2 La Danza
01  Lumbye: Champagnegalop
02  Tchaikovsky: Swan Lake, Op. 20, Act II. By a Lake. Scene. The swans swim on the lake
03  Grieg: Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, Op. 46. III. Anitra's Dance
04  Khachaturian: Gayane, Act III. Sabre Dance
05  Strauss II: An Der SchÃ¶nen Blauen Donau, Op. 314
06  Sibelius: Valse triste, Op. 44, No. 1
07  Handel: Water Music, Suite No. 1 in F Major, HWV 348. IX. Hornpipe
08  Ponchielli: La Gioconda, Act III. Danze delle Ore (Dance of the Hours)
09  Monti: Csardas
10  Brahms: 21 Hungarian Dances, WoO1, No. 5 in F - Sharp Minor (arr. for orchestra)
11  Dvorak: 16 Slavonic Dances, Series 2, Op. 72, B. 147, No. 10 in E Minor, Op. 72, No. 2
12  Stravinsky: The Firebird, Danse infernale du roi Kastchei
                (King Kastchei's Infernal Dance)
13  Waldteufel: Les Patineurs, Op. 183, 'The Skater's Waltz'
14  Offenbach: Orphee aux enfers (Orpheus in the Underworld) (Infernal Galop, 'Can-Can')
15  Tchaikovsky: Sleeping Beauty, Op. 66, Act II The Vision: Scene (Allegro agitato) 
16  Tchaikovsky: The Nutcracker Suite, Op. 71a: VIII. Waltz of the Flowers
17  Borodin: Prince Igor, Polovtsian Dances

CD 3 Vivace
01  Strauss R.: Also sprach Zarathustra, Op. 30, TrV 176. Einleitung 
02  Rimsky-Korsakov: Scheherazade, Op. 35. III. The Young Prince and the Young Princess
03  Bizet: Carmen, Act I. Prelude
04  Khachaturian: Spartacus, Suite No. 2. Adagio of Spartacus and Phrygia
05  Sarasate: Zigeunerweisen (Gypsy Airs), Op. 20
06  Grieg: Lyric Pieces, Book VIII, VI. Wedding Day at Troldhaugen
07  Dvorak: Symphony No. 9, in E minor, Op. 95 (B. 178) ''From the New World'' II. Largo
08  Schubert:  3 Marches militaires, Op. 51, D. 733. No. 1 in D Major (arr. for orchestra)
09  Shostakovich: The Gadfly Suite, Op. 97a. VIII. Romance 
10  Rimsky-Korsakov: The Tale of Tsar Saltan Suite, Op. 57. Flight of the Bumble - bee
11  Smetana: Ma Vlast, II. Vltava (Die Moldau)
12  Strauss I: Radetsky March, Op. 228

These links are for later editions with slightly different tracks
